ygData.subject: RE: Evocation!
ygData.msgSnippet: save a lot of points for research. you will need a LOT of them later. there is nothing worse than getting the pages for mind wipe (a 39 mem blur spell) and
ygData.messageBody:
save a lot of points for research. you will need a LOT of them later. there
is nothing worse than getting the pages for mind wipe (a 39 mem blur spell)
and failing. research pages are very hard to come by. if you have an excess
even moreso, use them to keep skills up that dont go up as fast as you
level. save 5 or so for specialization to make sure you max alteration. but
if i had it to do all over again, i'd have saved most all of my points for
research.

>What is there to put the points into if not Evocation?
-------------------
tim borrelli
lead character animator
"I dont suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it..."
